name: Empyrean Swarm (Alpha Demo)
description:
Take flight as Miccah Galiah in a X901-Adaptable Fighter as they try to escape the clutches of hostile enemy space!

A modern twist to a classic arcade game.

Features

- A unique game window and HUD that makes you feel like you're at the arcade.

- Smooth controls that help you dodge incoming enemy fire.

- Multiple abilities and weapons to unlock permanently as well as upgrades you can get each run to help improve your performance.

- 4 levels with unique bosses and different mechanics each level.

-A boss rush at the end with variant bosses and a challenging final boss that unlocks a new game mode

- Unlimited game mode unlocked by beating the primary story mode that provides an even larger challenge with randomly generated waves, patterns, and gradually increasing difficulty.

- A personal high score system with an online leaderboard using PlayFab for Unlimited mode!
